product_name: The North Face Badwater Redux Hat
long_description: Built for hot-weather adventure, the Badwater Redux Hat from The North Face features a protective sun cape so you can shield your neck from the sun. Sun cape unfolds from hidden rear stash pocket and secures to sides of the cap with snaps. Cloudy day? The cape folds up and stows in the cap. Lightweight, breathable ripstop nylon fabric dries quickly. Built-in UPF 50+ sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. The North Face Badwater Redux Hat feature an adjustable rear cinch cord that ensures a snug fit.
short_description: Built for hot-weather adventure, the Badwater Redux Hat from The North Face features a protective sun cape so you can shield your neck from the sun.
